trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> that is a composite of the transforms in its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref>.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup> class when you want to apply multiple general transforms to single object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref> objects that form this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref>.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref> objects that form this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref>.
The default value is an empty collection.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup.Children"></xref> dependency property.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true.`
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
Gets the inverse transform of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref>, if it has an inverse.
The inverse of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup> is created by combining the inverses of its child transforms.
The inverse transform of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref>, if it has an inverse; otherwise, `null`.
Transforms the specified bounding box to the smallest axis-aligned bounding box possible that contains all the points in the original bounding box.
The bounding box to transform.
The transformed bounding box, which is the smallest axis-aligned bounding box possible that contains all the points in the original bounding box.
Attempts to transform the specified point.
The point to transform.
The result of transforming inPoint.
**true** if inPoint was transformed; otherwise, **false**.
